profile_summary:
As a Senior Salesforce Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing essential **Salesforce** technologies including **Apex**, **Visualforce**, and **Lightning Web Components** to deliver high-performance solutions. My strong command of **JavaScript** further complements my expertise in integrating **Sales Cloud**, **Service Cloud**, and **Marketing Cloud** functionalities to meet business needs. I possess a solid understanding of **REST APIs** and **SOAP APIs** for seamless system integrations. 
I am proficient in organizational skills, proactivity, and possess exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, which allow me to effectively collaborate across teams and ensure project success. Additionally, I have a background in building scalable applications using technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**, and have experience in cloud environments such as **Azure** and **AWS**. My experience includes leading development initiatives while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
